episodes.title: In cult the torture starts in utero and continues after birth. #ramcoa
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. In cult the torture starts in utero, and continues as soon as we are born. It is intentional to keep us from bonding with the mother or parent who is carrying us so instead we will bond with the cult, and to start the dissociation and splitting really early on to try and control us for life. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok

episodes.title: My cult abuser parents saw me as property to benefit from even outside the organized trafficking
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. My cult abuser parents saw me as property to benefit from even outside of the organized trafficking. The number of times that they took me to members of the congregation of the church, or their friends or colleagues to offer me up for them to sexually assault me for favours or power or money was frequent and horrific. Most of the time they called out specific parts of me with the dissociative identity to service the people but if they didn't we knew that we had to switch into it because that was survival. I think the only reason I was birthed was to offer me up to the cult and give my parents a promotion. I am grateful to be safe now and to have chosen family and people who truly care about me. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #trafficking #ramcoasystem #dissociativeidentitydisorder

episodes.title: Cult used spinning for torture, disorientation, and programming #ramcoa #cultsurvivor #mindcontrol
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Cult used spinning for torture, disorientation, and programming. They would hang us as a child by our wrist usually with rope but sometimes with chains and spin us and spin us unrelentingly, so much that we felt like we could not think or focus. and then someone inside with the dissociative identity was given the job to hold on to that feeling and then to give it to us when we would break out rules as punishment, or to use it to disseminate a message throughout our dissociative system or to shut down information. So now when we feel dizzy if there's not a medical reason we know that it is programming happening and so we can talk to the folks inside and ask them if they can give us the information in a different way. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #mindcontrol #dissociativeidentitydisorder #ramcoasystem

episodes.title: Cult controls victims by convincing us we are constantly being monitored #ramcoasurvivor #ramcoa
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Cult controls victims by convincing us that we are being constantly monitored and will be tortured or killed for breaking any rules, by doing elaborate fake surgeries scenarios with props and costumes  and pain to convinces us kids that they have implanted microchips to constantly monitor us and report back, and put us in a room with another kid where we think we're alone but they have a hidden camera and then tell us word for word what we said. But also they intentionally create a personality with the dissociative identity who must report back to the cult any rule that we break or even want to break in any way such as trying to tell someone, trying to remember the abuse and torture, trying to talk inside to the other personalities. And so the cult frequently knows what we are doing and it convinces us that they are all seeing an all-powerful and we must absolutely comply or of course we will get tortured more or killed. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #traumatok

episodes.title: As cult torture survivors we can get around the mind control using creativity.
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture. As cult torture survivors we can use our creativity to get around the mind control messages, similar to how we used our creativity for DID. There is no limit inside; we just have to figure out the ways that work best for us. For instance when we have someone giving us the programming messages inside we sometimes have someone invisibly turn off their loudspeaker, or turn their words into harmless confetti or jello. Or when someone inside is giving us an image to self-harm or unalive ourselves we can ask if they can turn the image invisible, or cover it with opaque paint that we can't see through, or scrunch it up and have it turned into confetti before it reaches us. Or we can put those folks inside giving us the programming messages on the moon imside, or in a soundproof unbreakable bubble. 

But these things are just stopgap measures until we can actually talk with the folks inside who have the programming, hear their trauma with compassion and empathy, appreciate that they kept us alive, and eventually work with them to see how they would like to change their job if they would and that can help. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #mindcontrol  #traumatok

episodes.title: Cult demanded obedience; resistance meant increased torture
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. The intergenerational, interconnected cults that tortured and trafficked me and other kids demanded immediate obedience. If there was any hesitation or resistance it meant that we got tortured more, but also that the other kids got tortured more, and they did that especially with me because I resisted often and also it hurt me the most to have other kids be tortured or murdered. There is so much self blame and guilt (that does not belong to me) because the cult would say it was all our fault, and yet the memories of Judy who is the only one who resisted like that with me meant so much to me. Because in her and my trying not to hurt each other, in our whispering sorry when we were forced to torture each other, in our having gentle hands at the beginning of being forced to sexually assault or hurt each other meant that we were saying, I don't want to do this, I see you, I love you, I care about you, I wish this wasn't happening. And that is something I will always hold with me. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #traumatok

episodes.title: Cult tries to convince us that they are our family or will control us forever #ramcoa
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture
Cult tries to convince us that they are our only family, that we only belong with them, that they are the only ones who will save us or help us, and that they control us forever. But all of those things are lies, and it is important to reject the cult lies and to see through all the elaborate abuse and torture scenarios and mind control. Cult cannot fake real compassion and empathy, and once we get that for real from other people we can have real safety and chosen family that are the opposite of cult. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor

episodes.title: Cult taught us (DID) to self-hárm & unalive ourselves #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture, detail.
The cult taught specific folks inside us with the DID how to self-hárm ourselves and how to unalive ourselves through props, torture, and mind control. They used flesh-comoured thick silicone wrapped around our arm with packets of blood beneath that they had siphoned off earlier from us or other kids, and would have us slice through certain areas of the silicone for self-hárm or for unaliving, and then the blood would show we'd done it correctly. In between they would use needle torture, electrochock, and SA. For the training to unalive they had us cut where the arteries were and in addition to the packets of blood they would splash a bucket of blood on our face to simulate an artery gushing. They convinced those folks inside that if they killed the body they would take over. It is so important to talk with cult-created, cult-trained folks inside to help them see that if they kill the body everyone inside will be dead including them. And if they harm the body it will harm everyone inside. And that they do not need to do the things that cult taught them. They do not deserve to be hurt or to unalive themselves. If you are a fellow cult torture survivor I am so glad you're here. If you are a fellow DID system I am so glad you are here. If you have compassion and empathy I am so glad you are here. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #mindcontrol #selfinjury #traumatok

episodes.title: If you're a cult torture Survivor you can work through programming #ramcoasurvivor #mindcontrol
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture. A big part of the mind control in organized cult torture is to convince us that we are helpless, that there is no escape, that any choice we make will result in torture or sexual assault or murder or all of those things. But the cult lies. I was able to escape even though it took me most of my life and I escaped in stages. And I know other cult torture survivors who escaped sooner. 

If you have survived cult torture you are incredibly strong. If you developed DID to survive the torture and keep your sanity and your goodness you are incredibly strong. And you can work on the mind control. 

You can work with the folks inside who hold the mind control and ask them to turn down the volume or mute it. You could imagine their words becoming harmless confetti or them being temporarily held in a soundproof unbreakable bubble until you can work with them again. You can use your creativity and imagination to find loopholes or work around the programming. You can also ask them when they were first taught that and hear their trauma and respond with compassion and empathy and this will cut through the programming; programming is put in with hate and the cult can not fake real compassion and empathy. And eventually those folks inside will be willing to change their job.
#ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #mindcontrol

episodes.title: Believe survivors. There is proof in our DID, our memories, our bodies #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture, detail. Some people will say to us cult torture survivors "Where is the proof?" There is proof in our bodies, in our body memories, in our stories, and our trauma. There is proof in the DID we have that only comes from extreme, repeated ongoing childhood abuse and/or torture and all the other mental health effects that we have from the trauma such as cPTSD, suicidal ideation, anxiety and depression. And for some of us there is also proof in our bodies.

 I have never had a child in non-abuse, non-torture time and I have never been with a man by choice; I'm a non-binary lesbian. But my doctor found evidence of my having had a child because that is something that the cult forces on us those of us with a uterus - bearing babies who are unregistered for the cult to use in the torture, the trafficking, and to sell or to murder. My first dentist that I chose found gouges in my teeth that were made from my father and other cult members who created them in the torture. I have since ground them down but they were there. And if you are so bent on finding proof you could push police and law enforcement to actually investigate the organized child corn that cults created using us survivors. You can also look at websites like ra-info.org for news articles about arrests about cult torture. But just believe survivors. It is so painful and hard for us to speak out against all the mind control and torture that was done against us and the ways that they told us no one would believe us and all the many times that we are victim blamed or not believed. Just believe survivors. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #trafficking

episodes.title: Cults use props, costumes, & ideologies to try to discredit survivors, increase fear #ramcoa
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Organized cults use props and costumes, symbols, and ideology that they may not even believe in to try to discredit us when we do remember and speak out, and to connect back to in the mind control, and to increase our fear during the torture. The cult does not want people to believe us because if people believe us then they may work together to try and demand investigations, pushing past cult in those positions, and may actually interfere with some of the torture, child p0rn0gràphy, child prostitution and murder that the cults enjoy so much but that also give them money and power and favors. The more people that believe us and that talk to other people and help them see that it's not conspiracy theories or myths, the more likely it is that more survivors will get safe, and that is what I hope for. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #trafficking

episodes.title: Mind control is meant to isolate us, keep us from getting help, remembering, talking to help cult
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture. If you are a cult torture survivor and anyone tells you that there is no hope do not believe them. If you are a cult torture survivor and anyone tells you that you are helpless and a victim and there is no escape do not believe them. If you are a cult torture survivor and anyone tells you that you should not work with a therapist and that a therapist will not help you do not believe them. These are cues or things that are directly said in programming and cult torture. I was dismayed to hear all of these and many more cues in a recent workshop for cult torture survivors and DID systems. 

There are many reasons that someone can give a cue. Programming is based on a lot of common language and phrases, body language, nursery rhymes and songs, so some people can give a cue without knowing that they are doing it. Then there are cult torture survivors who are triggered into their own programming who may inadvertently cue someone with their own programming. There are cult torture survivors who are still being accessed, so still being tortured, who are forced to set off cues for other cult torture survivors. And then there are cult members who mask socially well and who insert themselves into jobs or positions or places where they can access child or adult cult torture victims to silence them and shut them down or cover up disclosures. 

You can notice  programming functioning such as your head suddenly feeling spinny or fuzzy, suddenly feeling hugely deeply despairing or hopeless or terrified and staying in that feeling and feeling like you can't get out of it, hearing some command or message repeat in a loop in your mind, seeing visuals of ways to hurt or unalive yourself.

If programming is functioning of course you can try to calm yourself down and use nervous system regulation techniques but those are often not enough. In my experience it helps to work directly with the programmed folks inside and with the program itself or the message. It helps to directly counteract the cult lies and give opposite messages. And it can help to map out your programming, the steps and who inside is to take them. I have someone inside who just like they can map out my system, there is someone else who can map out the programming; I just had to ask for their help. But if you can't get there yet if you can write out the messages that you were hearing and where it takes you to then you can work on countering those messages. It's also really important to work with those folks inside who hold the programming and work with them with compassion and empathy; they worked to help keep the body and self alive, and true compassion and empathy will always cut through the programming. 

For us recognizing that the programming is functioning, why it is like the cue or who inside is giving it, can really help quiet down the programming. You can also use a lot of creativity in working with the programming, finding loopholes, and changing it. #mindcontrol #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor

episodes.title: People using AI to create child corn encourages IMO more with real victims #cultsurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. AI and the billionaires who control it allowing users to create child corn just encourages, in my opinion, more child corn and trafficking. It normalizes it, it dehumanizes it and I think it makes them look for more. I believe this will increase the very organized child corn and trafficking that is already happening by organized cults like the ones who trafficked me and used me in corn. I wish that there were better laws and regulations around AI and the billionaires that allow all this to happen, but also for child and teen and adult victims and more protections. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #trafficking

episodes.title: As cult torture survivors we can be wary of people for many reasons & cult impersonates therapists
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture. As cult torture survivors we can be very wary of other people especially because most of the people in our lives who were adults were part of the cult torture, and because so many of the cult members were really good at social masking and had good jobs and looked like they should be trustworthy. So many of my cult abusers were therapists and child protective service providers and police and doctors and teachers, all in positions where they could access survivors and help to cover things up or report back on us. So we always think it's good to trust your gut--especially the first three to five seconds of first meeting someone. After that programming can cover up gut reactions, at least if it's about someone who abused us - we've had that happen. 

And then there are some people who might be trustworthy but who are using common cues like common body language cues and it doesn't mean that they're not trustworthy; we have to watch more and ask inside more. And when we were still being tortured the cult would impersonate our two good therapists, dress like them, try to pitch their voice like them, even use similar phrases or perfume, recreate their offices, and drug us up for torture and try to convince us that's what our therapist did, or try to convince us that we had killed our therapist by speaking - all to interfere with our therapy or keep us from talking. It's so important to look at the memories folks inside bring up and then to look all the way down through the layers so that we can see past what cult wants us to believe. So it's good to trust our gut and to make sure that we look through the layers and talk with everyone inside who has something to say about it. Those things help us and we hope that they will help you too. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #ramcoasystem

episodes.title: Some people demand names from us cult torture survivors even tho it would put us in danger #ramcoa
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture. Some people in my comments are demanding information, names of perpetrators or cults, that would put me and other cult torture survivors in danger for naming. They are not thinking or caring about our safety, yet the lives of every cult torture survivor matters. I do in many of my videos name some of the cults that were interconnected and involved, such as KKK, Nazi, and Satanic, and at least half of the population of the United Church my parents went to were part of one cult or another, and there were many other religions that trafficked and tortured us kids. But there are others that I am not going to name for my safety. And I am not going to publicly name any of my perpetrators because that would put me in danger. And I don't recommend that any cult torture Survivor do that. If they choose to take it to court that is their choice; the legal system is set up for perpetrators and white heterosexual rich men and it can be re-traumatizing, but maybe the system will start to change especially as more people actually hear and believe us. 

It is so hard for many of us cult torture survivors to name cults because 1. When we did we were so often not believed, 2. We are fighting mind control that was put in there through repeated torture to even speak out. When I did speak out when I was still being tortured the torture and the mind control increased, and it is amazing I am alive. 3. Many of our perpetrators are connected to or are themselves powerful people with money and power and favors and connections and they could come after us. 

The few times I did go to the police it put me in more danger, and it did not end up helping any of the victims being tortured or me.

Our naming names is not going to help cult torture victims being tortured now; we often don't remember all of our perpetrators and the cults are interconnected. We need systemic change where cult members in police, doctors, child protective services, victim services are removed from their jobs, and where we change laws, and survivors  are actually protected and supported. When I ran away around 17 and I ran to a shelter my cult abusers still accessed me every single night. Running away doesn't make us safe, not the first time. We need people to care about us and to dig in and to fight for change on a systemic level. And to keep talking about cult torture and trafficking and to care. If you have been hearing us and believing us, thank you. That is the first step to making change. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #trafficking #traumahealing

episodes.title: So many people ask how they can help us cult torture and trafficking survivors #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture. So many people after hearing my story as a cult torture and organized trafficking Survivor for the first time ask me how they can help. 

We need people to hear us survivors when we speak out, so amplifying our stories by sharing them, but also sharing them with people you know. Talking to people in your community, your family, about organized cult torture and trafficking. 

We also need systemic change. We need things to change in the police, lawyers, doctors, teachers, child protective services, and adult victim services, social workers and therapists, where they are truly trauma-informed and they actually understand and know what happens in organized cults and they know the signs to look out for and they can become more educated and can protect victims sooner and hopefully actually go after the perpetrators. 

Right now the legal system is set up for perpetrators, and we need the legal system and the police system to change. 

and also educate yourself especially if you are in one of those helping professions. I have an article on the Signs and Symptoms of a Cult Torture Survivor (L1nk in B1o) which I hope you'll read and share with people in those professions. You can also read books by Alison Miller on cult torture and mind control, and Safe Passage To Healing by Chrystine Oksana; l1nks on my site. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #trafficking #traumatok #traumahealing

episodes.title: People like to think they could spot child trafficking & cult torture but most would miss it #ramcoa
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture. So many people think that they would be able to spot child trafficking and cult torture happening in their neighborhoods but most people would miss it. what they would have seen in me is a very shy, obedient, introverted child who went to public school, went to a extracurricular activities, had very involved, overprotective parents who went to church every sunday, my father taught Sunday school my mother sang in the choir. If you had them as neighbors you would think they were nice. But they were a trafficking and torturing me and other kids everyday and every night in the culture. 

If you'd like to help make change please amplify Survivor voices, talk about cult torture and trafficking to your friends, share our videos, and please believe survivors. If you want to look out for survivors now to provide support or to help, or if you're in a helping or policing profession please read my Signs and Symptoms of a Cult Torture Survivor l1nked in my b1o and on my website, and share it with others. The more people believe survivors, the more we talk about it, the more we make actual change in the systems that are supposed to protect us the more I hope survivors will get safe sooner than I did. 
#trafficking  #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #traumatok #ramcoa

episodes.title: cult often siphoned off our blood to drink & to sell #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. The cults often siphoned off our blood as a baby, child, and teen, to drink and to sell. They told buyers (and some cult also believed) that drinking our blood would give them extra vitality and life, which is not true and is cruel and disgusting. They also would tell us that they had power and control over us because they had drunk our blood, using that message in mind control and torture. So they gained more money and power and used it as a form of mind control over victims. Everything the cult does is deliberate. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #traumatok #ramcoasystem

episodes.title: It can take a long time for cult torture survivors to get safe #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. For most of my life, all the years that I was being tortured in trafficked by the cults that my parents and other family were part of I wished that someone would save me. Of course no one did and I had to save myself, and it took so long. I had to work on inner communication and cooperation with the dissociative identity so we would stop losing time. we had to work on our trauma memories and remember who abused us and be able to retain that in everyday time so that we can stay away from them. We had to run away over and over again and each time we did our abusers found us and brought us back and increase the torture in mind control but we also got a level more of safe. And we needed a good therapist who would care about us and hear us with compassion and empathy and be that anchor and challenge the programming. I wish that things were different. You can't just rescue a cult torture survivor you don't know all the cult abusers who are hiding in plain sight to keep them away from. And they likely don't know either because that's the way dissociation and programming works. And I still wish that all of us cult torture survivors had been saved and could be safe. If you're in the helping profession and you want to know how to recognize cult survivors to help them sooner you can read my article some signs and symptoms of cult torture Survivors on my website, l1nk in b10. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #trafficking #traumatok #ramvoasystem

episodes.title: How to opt out of the Alice In Wonderland theme in Finch  #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor
We get to decide what jobs folks inside want (DID) especially those created by cult
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. We get to decide now what jobs folks inside want including and especially those who were created or trained by cult. There are many folks inside who would never agree to do the job that the cult wanted even though the cult created them and so the cult discarded them or told them to be ghosts or spies inside or to just wait around for a new job. So we get to help them see that they can choose their own job now. But since our system is polyfragmented it can get overwhelming because there are thousands and thousands of parts inside, and there are so many parts even for just one torture memory. So when folks inside tell us how they were created or that they want something different we especially work with them to give them compassion and empathy and help them figure out what they want to do now. #ramcoasystem #did #polyfragmentedsystem #dissociativeidentitydisorder #ramcoasurvivor

episodes.title: This month's Finch has a theme that can be triggering for #cultsurvivor s #ramcoasurvivor
Cult wanted us to believe there was no hope, no good people, no escape. They lied #cultsurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. The cult wanted us to believe there was no hope, no good people in the world, and no escape - and it did feel like there was no hope and no escape while we were being tortured and trafficked and witnessing murder. When everyone around us were cult abusers or unaware of what was happening and not helping. But there were still good people, even during the torture like other victims who would connect with us, like ourselves fighting back in the ways that we could. And we did escape even though it took a long time we had got safe. There is hope, and safety and healing are possible. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #ramcoasystem #traumatok

episodes.title: One thing all the cult members had in common was lacking compassion #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. The cult abusers, no matter which cult they belonged to, brought in scientists for experiments and some military from other countries for the torture and mind control, and what they all had in common was a lack of empathy and compassion. I am so grateful that I and other survivors were able to hold on to our empathy and compassion and goodness and fight to be the opposite of cult. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #ramcoasystem

episodes.title: Cult made money off of us even as an adult #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
Working through triggers as a cult torture survivor with #DID can feel hard #cultsurvivor #ramcoa
We can work with cult-created insiders on programming & get safe #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #did
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. As cult torture survivors we can work on programming to get safe, but that means working with the cult created, cult-trained folks inside who hold the programming (DID). It means talking to them with compassion and empathy, recognizing all the torture they survived to keep us alive, repeatedly challenging the cult lies and helping them see that they and everyone else do not deserve to be tortured. And if the cult torture survivor isn't safe yet it means working on all that, as well as increasing inner communication and inner cooperation to stop losing time, to work on recognizing who the abusers are to avoid them and eventually get away, working with the self-reporting tortured folks inside so that they don't report the really important ways of trying to heal or escape but give lesser information instead, and using creativity to work around the programming or change it or find loopholes with the folks inside who were trained with the programming. It can also mean running away over and over again. I had to run away so many times to get completely safe but each major time I ran away I got a little bit safer. It can take a long time; it took most of my life, but I did get safe, and I've talked to other survivors who got safe sooner. It can happen and there is  hope. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #did #ramcoasystem #mindcontrol

episodes.description: TW: cult torture. To survive the cult torture, the trafficking, the child p0rn0gràphy, not only did we have to split creating folks inside with the dissociative identity, some of which was self-created and some of which was cult created, we also had to have folks inside who stayed unaware of the torture who could function in the everyday time like going to school and church. That was me and other everyday fronting folks. I did not know why I felt so sad or afraid or in pain or not wanting to be here every day until we started remembering around age 13 and someone inside me disclosed where a teacher actually listened. Then we were able to hang on to some of the memories that folks inside were telling us, and it moved from memories of incest to more grotesque and then to cult torture because we could not face it any other way. #did #ramcoasystem #dissociativeidentitydisorder #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor

episodes.title: The cult made so much money off of me and other victims #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor
So many things need to change to help cult torture survivors including the legal system #ramcoa
Cult deliberately creates a bond between us kids and a cult member #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture, detail. The cult deliberately had cult members work to bond with specific children pretending to be kind and compassionate or whatever it was that would draw the kids in and make them loyal to the cult and not want to escape. They're called the Other Mother or the Other Father and they pretend to be kind and caring and pretend to save the child from the torture or tell them they will, and then repeatedly torture and sexually assault the child and tell them they deserved it, and then go back to compassion empathy. This is really confusing to the child unless they split for each kind of trauma. But it does create bonds for some parts inside to that cult member, so it helps to look at the whole memory, and join up those splits. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #traumatok

episodes.title: The cult tried to make us be like them. They could not. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
The cult regularly traded us victims & torture techniques with other cults #ramcoasurvivor
So many cult torture survivors have long term effects including physical #ramcoasurvivor
As a #cultsurvivor, even though we (DID) are safe now, we still don't sleep well #ramcoasurvivor
Cult bases core programming cues on basic things. There is always a way to work with it.
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Cult bases core programs such as don't talk, don't remember, don't believe ourselves, and believe cult is all powerful on common body image, children's songs & nursery rhymes, religious songs, etc. that we will frequently encounter in society so that we will constantly have those programs set off which protect the cult and allow them to keep torturing and trafficking and murdering and gain more money and power and favors. But there is always a way to work around programming, to mute it or minimize it or lower the volume. We just need to use our imaginations and creative thinking, as well as compassion and empathy which always cuts through the hate, and talking to those folks inside with the dissociative identity who hold on to the programming and hear them about their trauma and counteract the cult's lies. There is always a way to change or lessen programming. #mindcontrol #ramcoa #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor

The cult used everything I was doing in my healing but they could not stop us
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. The cult interfered with every aspect of my healing that they could and they knew about it from the folks inside that they created to report back to them, and from my partner at the time who was cult involved and other people that we had not yet remembered. They made sure to use everything they found out I was using in our healing, including our art and writing on cult torture and DID and mind control that we have been sharing since we were a teen at conferences and in art shows and survivor newsletters, layering on mind control and torture and telling us that it would hurt or kill others or hurt or kill us, and trying to stop us. But they could not stop us. They could slow us down but they could not stop us. Talking about cult torture and mind control and DID and helping other survivors know that they're not alone in their pain and that they can remember and get safe is so core and important to us, and the cult could not stop that. Survivors are strong and our compassion and healing can always cut through the mind control and the hate. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumahealing

episodes.title: My cult abuser parents sent us (DID) to extracurricular activities to keep up the facade
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. My cult  abuser parents sent us (DID) to extracurricular activities to keep up this facade of a normal family with no trafficking or torture or abuse happening, but the activities they sent us to were ones that made us feel even more vulnerable with our body image when we were already being looked at and exploited, such as swimming and ice skating, and we hated them. We didn't really get to choose until we were a teenager. We showed so many obvious signs and symptoms of being a cult torture survivor. (I have an article up on my website if you want to read some of the signs that may help you with children or teens or even adults being exploited now.) #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #plural  #ramcoasystem #dissociativeidentitydisorder

Cult intentionally made sure we wouldn't trust most people, especially authority figures
episodes.description: TW. cult torture. A huge part of the cult torture was repeatedly having cult dress up as doctors and nurses, police, social workers, therapists, child protective services, and then sexually assaulting us and torturing us in elaborate abuse scenarios so that we would not trust or talk to thise authority figures. But it was also the cult pretending to be outside people or having the "other mother" or "other father" (cult members who would pretend to be kind to try to get the child to bond to the cult), and having those people say after we'd been tortured "oh I can see you're in so much pain; tell me everything and I'm going to help you escape'" and then increasing the torture and the mind control about not talking. They were intentionally trying to make us not trust anyone. So finding safe people now who we can trust and talk to and be heard by with compassion and empathy is a huge part of healing and of countering the mind control. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #traumatok #ramcoa

episodes.title: the cult used sirens in programming #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #mindcontrol

episodes.description: TW: cult torture. We never bonded with our cult abuser parents even though that is a basic need to bond with your caregivers as a baby and a child. We never liked them and I couldn't figure out why until I started remembering around age 15 how they tortured us. They never even touched us in a safe or loving way and that may have helped us remember sooner but it didn't help us get safe sooner. We have so much grief around never having had safety or love, unconditional love, but we are so glad that we were able to see through it, and repeatedly try to get safe, and eventually get safe. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor  #ramcoasystem #plural #dissociativeidentity

episodes.title: The cult used temperature in torture #ramcoa
episodes.description: TW: cult torture, detail. Cult used everything they could in the torture and that included temperature, such as really really cold water and then warm or hot water so it feels like it's burning. Or cold water with a giant hose blasting at us so it feels like there is internal bruising and almost like our bones are breaking. Or locking us in a sauna which makes it hard to breathe especially if we have asthma. So if you have trouble with temperature and you're also a cult torture survivor it makes so much sense. #ramcoasurvivor #cultsurvivor #traumatok

episodes.title: Cult taught some insiders (DID) that they were dead or to want to unalive self #ramcoasystem
I had a triggering medical appointment as a cult torture survivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture, some detail. I had a triggering medical appointment the other day, a full body scan. Beforehand I talked to everyone inside with the dissociative identity and told them that they didn't have to be there if they didn't want to. We also called on our Tough Guys and our mothering and wise folks. And then at the appointment I told the nurse that I'm a cult torture survivor and that my abusers used to dress up as doctors and nurses and used medical equipment for torture, and she was able to hear me, which helped. And then for the scan she did not strap my arms down even though that's normally done; she allowed us to just tuck our hands under our thighs which helped, and she told us to close our eyes for the scanner and she put a tissue box on our chest after finding out that we were a little claustrophobic so that the scanner wouldn't come as close to our face, and those things helped. But still we got triggered down to being paralyzed by drugs and locked in a coffin and buried underground, which the cult did to us often. And folks inside after the drug wore off pounding the lid of the coffin and wanting to do the same thing with the scanner. But we got through; we were just really wiped, and it helped a lot to have both inner cooperation and folks inside helping out, some objects that helped us feel stronger and calmer, and a kind nurse. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #ramcoasystem #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder

episodes.description: TW: cult torture, detail. The cult deliberately used during torture so many techniques that are used in therapy and healing, including but not limited to deep breathing, meditation, guided meditation, having us stay in the body and notice what we felt and use our other senses, EMDR (light bar and bilateral stimulation) once they knew I was using EMDR in therapy, internal rescue work, and they also created elaborate abuse and torture scenarios where they had someone who would pretend to be my current therapist and pretend to be poisoned by me or killed by me because I was talking. They did everything they could to try and prevent us from remembering, talking, believing ourself, and having internal communication. The cult is calculated and deliberate and cruel. But that doesn't stop survivors from remembering and talking; it just may slow down the process. #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #traumatok #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder

episodes.title: Cult intentionally uses our built-in aversion to insects etc. for torture #cultsurvivor #ramcoa
We (DID) went from despair to professional demeanor in less than 5 min
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. We (plural/dissociative identity) recently went from despair and being really triggered to professional demeanor in less than five minutes - by switching. Right before a second meeting we'd had a zoom that was incredibly triggering and brought us to despair. We'd been crying, but we wanted to go to the next meeting and be professional, so I called on my educator parts, information parts, therapist parts and wise parts and pulled them out, and we were able to be there in the meeting really professionally, helping out, although our hands and legs shook but they couldn't see that, and we did dig our nails into our hands which isn't the best coping but we were still able to be there which is what we wanted. But it was so familiar to me that switching from trauma or what reminded us of trauma into everyday parts coping which is what we had to do often from the torture to going to school, although I don't remember deliberately being called out or having folks called out for everyday time but I know that we were taught to by cult. #ramcoasurvivor #ramcoasystem #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder

episodes.title: I have a messed up relationship with food because of the cult torture #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture, detail. I have a messed up relationship with food (though I don't think we have an eating disorder) because of all the cult torture, all the times that they forced us to ingest things that no one should ever have to ingest, and all the times in the summer and other times when they would starve us for weeks or a month or close to two months and then force feed us. We can't ever miss a meal because of that, although some parts of me because they went through the starvation are familiar with it and can go there. And we are also affected by all the times they forced us to ingest horrific things like human flesh after murder, and our own feces and vomit and blood and that of others. I have to be a vegetarian because of that and I tried to even as a child even though I wasn't allowed to. I can't consume red things especially liquidy or I have to change the color like putting ground up chickpeas into spaghetti sauce. I have weeks or months when I will have the same thing because it is comforting and it's like a safe food for me but some of that might also be the autism. There's lots of textures I can't handle and a lot of that relates back to the cult torture but some of it might also be the autism. We try to eat healthy but we have to have chocolate because it feels like a form of comfort but also helps my mood. I know I'm not the only cult of torture survivor who has a messed up relationship with food because of the torture, and makes so much sense that we do. It's good to deal with it as we can as slowly as we need to. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok

episodes.description: TW: cult torture. The cult made some of us victims - those of us who resisted and fought back they would repeatedly put in victim roles, and others who showed signs of enjoying torturing and SAing others, or showed relief at being tortured less when they would comply, they groomed to become cult. The organized cults that tortured me birthed all their victims and tried to make us all become future cult members/perpetrators, but they could not. I fought back, my friend Judy fought back, and so many survivors did, even with the increased torture and mind control we experienced. That takes enormous courage and strength; survivors are strong. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok #ramcoasystem #plural

episodes.description: TW: cult torture. For many of us cult torture survivors we have baby parts because we were tortured as babies, and often before birth. I'm sure it's based on psychological research to try and gain greater control over us and make us into sex slaves for the trafficking, and make us more compliant for the torture. The baby parts often can't talk, but they can communicate in other ways, sometimes through internal interpreters. It helps to have compassion and empathy for those vulnerable parts of us and to try to nurture them, and even be held. It can help with healing. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder #ramcoasystem

episodes.title: Cults don't want us survivors to remember, gain inner communication & cooperation #cultsurvivor
People ask me how the cult could do what they did #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Often when people hear about the cult torture I lived through they'll ask me how cult members could do what they do. I don't understand how they could torture us on an emotional and and soul level, but I do know that the cult tried to stamp out our compassion and empathy repeatedly and deliberately through torture scenario,s and that the cult members would have gone through the same or similar programming when they were kids. I know this because the cults were intergenerational; I remember my great-grandparents, my grandparents, and my parents all being part of the cult torture, but at some point they made a choice to become cult and to not fight back. And the cult would reward the victims who learned to torture more easily with less torture or more privilege. The adult cult members would also get off on our pain and terror sexually and emotionally. And they also gained money and favors and power. But beyond that I don't understand how they could do something so cruel and inhumane. If you are also a cult torture survivor working on healing then I am so proud of you and you are doing a huge courageous, healthy thing. And I hope you are proud of you, too. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok

episodes.title: There can be a lot of emotional flashbacks this time of year #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumahealing
Cult- created insiders (DID) think they're evil; they've been thru torture & need compassion
episodes.description: TW: cult torture, detail. The cult intentionally creates folks inside with the dissociative identity who believe that they are monsters or evil or undead or demons and they put them through extreme ongoing torture in conjunction with mind control and repeated negative messages. They also create intentional divisions and walls between those folks inside and self-created folks. And those inner folks who believe that they are monstrous usually believe that they don't deserve love or compassion or empathy. They need so much of that and they need to be heard. We recently went through a really horrific memory where we were forced to ingest slices of the heart of someone we love and that Insider felt that they were a monster and were told that they were. But through hearing them with compassion, hugging them, and giving them the opposite message we were able to show them that they're not a monster and then they were able to transform some inside. It is so important to give those insiders compassion and love. #ramcoa #cultsurvivor #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder #traumatok

episodes.title: We often didn't want to live through the torture. We're grateful to be alive #cultsurvivor #ramcoa
We have insider artists who draw trauma art, and others who draw our DID #cultsurvivor #plural
Different holidays that cult used can hit differently. Inner talk can help. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Different holidays that cult uses can hit differently and self-talk can help. I've noticed that for Halloween we have terror and fear all of October and sometimes all of September and then there is relief and then depression. But Christmas there is always a lot of grief and loneliness and sadness and other triggers. And we have been more triggered lately, where some folks inside were feeling unlovable. So we did some reassuring self-talk, reminding everyone inside that we will move through this and it's like this every year. But we also did some visualization where for the kids who felt unlovable we visualized hugging them, tough guys and mothering parts and wise parts, and that helped change how we were feeling. Visualization and inner self-talk can be incredibly healing. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder #traumahealing

episodes.title: I often wonder what it would have been like to grow up not tortured #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
The cult used drugs on us to increase unbearable emotion #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. The cults that tortured and trafficked me used drugs to increase the intensity of emotion especially when it was already unbearable despair or not wanting to be here, and that is such a cruel and intentional thing to do, on top of the psychological, physical, and sexual torture. It would increase the splitting in us with dissociative identity and the cult knew that and would then use some of those splits to create the cult jobs they wanted, like having someone inside hold on to that intense and bearable emotion and then intentionally send it to the rest of us inside on a cue or command. So it can help to talk to those folks inside who hold on to that emotion or memory and ask if there's anything that they can do to gain comfort that will not hurt the body or anyone else, and to use techniques like EFT tapping and even positive distraction, writing or drawing it out, and of course talking about it and being heard with compassion and empathy which can help cut through the programming. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder

episodes.title: I avoid a lot of triggers and cues but it's harder around the holidays #cultsurvivor #ramcoa
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. There are so many triggers and cues that I face everyday as a cult torture survivor, but I realized that there are some we (with the dissociative identity) deliberately try to avoid, such as organized religion because of how much it was used in the trafficking and torture, and many Christian songs, hymns, Christian Christmas songs, and non religious Christmas songs that were used in the programming so are cues. It is much harder to avoid all of that in December. Some cues we have worked so much on that we just notice it and it doesn't affect us but others can still be hard. I love seeing the progress we've made, and I still wish that we had never been tortured. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #mindcontrol

episodes.title: I was called an old soul frequently as a child but it was trauma #cultsurvivor #ramcoa
Being heard with compassion can be healing #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
We can lessen the effects of triggers & cues & overcome many #ramcoa #cultsurvivor
Cult used as many forms of torture as they could including sensory overload #ramcoa #cultsurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture, detail. The cults that tortured me and other kids, teens, and adults  (KKK, Nazi, & Satanic among others) used all the forms of torture that they could - physical, sexual, psychological, spiritual.  They also used sensory torture. For physical torture they would do things like needles and electric shock and hanging us by our limbs and spinning us and suffocation and drowning then reviving, looking us up in small spaces like coffins or boxes and sensory deprivation. But they also used sensory overwhelm/torture where they would put me in a room and send through the speakers such loud noise or screaming music, metal music, that it physically hurt my eardrums and I could feel it in my bones and it felt unbearable, while flashing the lights on and off, and then applying some physical or sexual torture. It made me feel dizzy and sick and in pain. I am neurodivergent in multiple ways, with the DID as well as autism and ADHD, and I can get sensory overload with loud continuous noises so this felt torturous on an additional level. And sometimes now when I get sensory overloaded and it feels too overwhelming I don't know if it is because of the torture or because I'm autistic or because I'm triggered or all of those things. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok #plural

episodes.title: We can lessen and overcome mind control #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #mindcontrol
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Many cult torture survivors and their therapists when they first realize that the survivor has had mind control used against them get afraid and think that it is all powerful. but it is not. We can overcome mind control, we can override it, we can lessen its effects. I always fought back against mind control and the core programs of not talking about the torture, not remembering it, not believing it. I started remembering the child sexual abuse at 13, the cult torture at 15, and I made art and wrote articles and sent them into survivor newsletters, and had my art up at conferences and a traveling art show, and published in a newspaper and journals, and posted some of the articles on my website. All those years I was still being tortured and spoke out the cult increased the torture and the mind control but they couldn't stop me from speaking out. Some programming I still hear like words in my head to kill myself and I know that it goes down to the torture and the mind control. Many days it is just words and then other days when there are too many cues or triggers it gets more intense but I can work with the folks inside who hold on to that. We can always work with the folks inside hold onto the programming, listen to what they went through, change their jobs, and keep working on healing. We are more powerful than mind control which was put in through hate. Compassion and love and healing help change it. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #mindcontrol #traumatok

episodes.title: Cult used hugs in programming & torture yet safe hugs can be healing #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Cult used hugs in programming and torture, yet safe hugs can be so healing. The cult would pretend to be kind and loving and hug us, and then  tell us that our hug or our touch was killing them or hurting them or was giving them permission to sexually assault us or hurt us, and then they would sexually assault us or hurt us. They were trying to keep us from trusting other people and getting safety with other people. So some folks inside me with the dissociative identity who went through that take a really long time to trust other people with safe touch and hugs. But when they do, after watching and listening for a long time and seeing that the person really is safe, and they front in with me in my body to actually get a hug then it can feel really healing on a deep level. It sounds like a little thing but safe touch and hugs are the opposite for us of sexual assault and torture and cult. They are healing. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok

Because we have a high pain tolerance we have to pay attention #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #plural
Cults convinced some inner folks they were demons or monsters; they're not, they're part of me.
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture. The cults that tortured me, especially the Satanic and Christian cults, often deliberately created folks inside with the dissociative identity and made them believe through repeated torture and mind control that they were demons or monsters or vampires or less than human in order to make those folks inside believe that no one should love them or ever could ever love them, that they deserved the torture, the extreme ongoing torture that was happening to them, so they would be more bonded with and more loyal to the cult because they would identify with the cult, that they would keep from making bonds with other people because they felt like they were less than human or so despicable or horrific that they deserved the torture and didn't deserve to bond with anybody or have compassion or empathy. Those insiders are split off parts of my psyche just like everyone else inside with the dissociative identity. They have been through some of the most extreme ongoing torture and mind control, and they helped the system and the body survive, they helped us survive by keeping us alive, by taking on that job and role, by allowing themselves to be convinced by cult that they were demons or monsters or less than human because the cult would not stop the torture and the mind control until someone inside took on those beliefs, those roles, those jobs.

But they're not actually demons or monsters are less than human; they're part of my mind and body and soul, they are part of me. And it's so easy to see when you talk to them with compassion and empathy and respect; they start to change their job and become some of the strongest protectors inside. They have so much goodness in them. They took on the jobs that no one else inside could, they took on so much extreme torture and repeated mind control and helped keep us alive. They deserve our respect and our compassion and empathy in working with them. And to do something like an exorcism when they are not demons or monsters or less than human would traumatize them, traumatize the whole entire system and me, would hurt them and all of us, would hurt them and us emotionally, psychologically, and would reinforce the cult messages that they are demons or monsters or less than human. They need compassion and love and empathy. And we can see by how they respond that they are part of the self, part of the soul, part of the mind and body. They wanted us to stay alive, they wanted us to survive the torture and get through, and that's why they took on the job because they had to. They're not demons, they're not monsters, they're not less than human; they're part of me and deserve to be heard and to be respected and to be treated kindly and with compassion. And I am so grateful for them; they got us through some of the worst torture. #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok

episodes.title: I got so scared when the dentist used pliers on a temp crown. Now I know why #cultsurvivor #ramcoa
Cult made cult-created insiders split off of self-created ones #dissociativeidentity #ramcoa
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. We have so many self-created insiders with the dissociative identity that we made to be the opposite of cult and all the cult jobs and roles the cult was forcing on us. We made so many inner folks with compassion and empathy and love and wisdom and caring about other people. And for some of them that the cult found out about they split off folks inside over and over and over through torture until they could make someone inside take on the role and job that they wanted. They intentionally made cult-created folks out of our self-made folks. It makes me so angry and it feels like such a betrayal. But even with all of that they still could not force us to become like cult or completely control us. We never stopped trying to heal, to get safe, to talk about the torture and mind control and dissociative identity, to try and help others and ourselves. So many survivors have done the same and if you're also a survivor I hope you see the strength and courage in you. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder #culttorturesurvivor

episodes.title: Cults use torture & reward to try to make us like them #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Cults use both torture and rewards to try and make us like them, to someday take their place as the torturers and members. They use both to try and stamp out our compassion and empathy, and make us more loyal to the cult. For those of us who had to be repeatedly forced to torture and sexually assault and murder they put us repeatedly in the victim position. But for other kids they gave them praise and told them they would get rewarded by moving up in the cult and gain power if they could torture and sexually assault and murder, and lose their compassion. Of course kids want safety and to belong and to have praise and to be tortured less, and many kids tried to gain that which makes sense. Cults even use the phrase "the Chosen One" or being special which is popularized in our society and so we will often hear those phrases and have it reinforce mind control about that. But as a child and a teen we were forced to do horrible things in cult torture and it was never our fault. And for many of us who were still tortured as adults we again did not have a choice as one adult trying to fight back against many, and experiencing torture on a daily nightly basis. But if we are healing now that makes such a huge difference. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #mindcontrol #traumahealing

episodes.title: There's grief in not having had love from parents, but healing in compassion #cultsurvivor #ramcoa
When I was a child I didn't believe I would grow up to be an adult. I'm glad I did #cultsurvivor
Cult is calculated & devious in how they set up cues #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor #mindcontrol
The cult taught inner folks to give body memories for breaking rules #mindcontrol #ramcoa #plural
Compassion, empathy, & love break thru mind control & help healing #ramcoa #cultsurvivor #plural
I'm so glad to be safe & there are long-term effects from the cult torture #cultsurvivor #ramcoa
The cult made me forget the DID system maps we made #cultsurvivor #dissociativeidentitydisorder
episodes.description:
TW: cult torture, detail. The cult made me forget about our DID system maps.
I have so much grief and anger over everything the cult did to me, all the torture and mind control and trafficking, the ways they intentionally impacted my brain through the trauma and torture and the deliberate creation of DID. But now I have something new that I've remembered. 

20 years ago I was mapping my DID system with folks inside who hold that knowledge and were helping me. I was still being tortured and my partner at the time who was part of cult saw that I was mapping my system, tortured and sexually assaulted me, and told the cult. They tortured me over and over and used increased mind control to metaphorically cut the awareness of the system maps out of my brain and I forgot about them. For 20 years I didn't know about them. 

I think that the cult did this because they wanted to interfere with internal communication and cooperation because that helps us stop losing time and get safe sooner. But also because my insiders are named by job so I can see by looking at the system maps the programming or the torture or the abuse scenarios that were done to create them, and there are also descriptions in the mapping. And I can see where the cult made cult-created parts off of my self-made parts and some ones who are very dear to me. 

 I still didn't remember the system maps, the only reason I found them is because I was looking for a scan of a hand drawn system map that I have made with my therapist, and I found these files. Thankfully I had hidden them enough in all the file folders and made multiple copies of my entire computer and just copied them over to my laptops over the years. I feel so much grief and anger and betrayal that the cult kept knowledge from me of my own system. I'm grateful I found them now and I can use them in my healing but there is grief about it. How much further could I have gone in my healing if I had still stayed aware of them 20 years ago? #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder #mindcontrol

episodes.title: My teachers saw signs of child abuse but assumed my parents were non offending #cultsurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Most of my teachers did see signs of child abuse or knew I was really troubled and scared but they assumed that my parents were non-offending because my parents masked so well and acted like they were so concerned. And once I remembered and disclosed the child sexual abuse with my great uncle, which I could do because he wasn't living in the home with me like my parents were who were telling me they would kill me if I talked, the teachers, police, social worker assumed that all the trauma and symptoms I showed were from him and that my parents were not offending. But I showed so many signs not just a child sexual abuse but also of cult torture, so many of the signs in my article that most people are not aware of those. But teachers did see lots of signs. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok

episodes.title: Some places the cult used for torture & trafficking #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. The cult torture and trafficking happened in so many places - the formal rituals and torture in the middle of the night outside the city in deserted fields or in forests in clearings, on private land, or in large parks in clearings or graveyards. The torture & SA also happened in warehouses or buildings where every room was used by the cult, in basements of some do-gooder organizations, in bunkers, in tunnels, and some military buildings or decommissioned military buildings. And some of the mass sexual assault and orgies happened in private clubs or church basements like the one that my parents went to every Sunday. The trafficking also happened in warehouses where they separated some of the basement into stalls that they made to look like children's bedrooms with beds and teddy bears and recording devices. But for very rich clients the trafficking would happen on private airplanes where they would be SAing and torturing us, or by taking us to their homes or businesses. It was very organized, and the interconnected intergenerational cults, KKK, Nazi, and Satanic, among others, shared resources, victims, torture techniques and mind control techniques, and also sold some of those techniques to other cults or to abusers who would pay them a high fee. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok

episodes.title: Cult torture & trafficking happens in "good" neighbourhoods; cult masks well #ramcoa
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Cult torture and trafficking can happen anywhere, in big cities or small towns in neighborhoods that look good. My parents owned their own home in a good neighborhood, they volunteered regularly, held a good jobs, were educated, dressed well and were polite, masked incredibly well and people would think that they were reasonably nice but overprotective parents who were so concerned about their introverted shy kid, and when pushed by the school they took me to a cult involved psychologist who blamed it all on premature birth etc. The cult is very careful to not have signs of torture show; most are beneath clothing and also most people wouldn't look at things like needle marks beneath fingernails or between fingers, and electroshock doesn't leave marks.  Cult torture and trafficking can be happening in nice neighborhoods. #cultsurvivor #trafficking  #ramcoa

episodes.title: I grew up being cult tortured in a good neighbourhood #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. I grew up being cult tortured in a good neighborhood in Toronto that is liberal leaning and progressive, and you'd think that people there would be more aware of the signs of abuse and trauma but they were not. I think most people expect that cult torture and trafficking happens in compounds or isolated or disreputable neighborhoods but it can be happening right under your nose in good neighborhoods where the kids go to public school and the families look presentable. My parents held a good jobs, they looked overprotective in how much they were involved in my life and controlled who I could talk to and how they appeared concerned. Cult members are so good at social masking; they have to be so they aren't detected. My parents went to church every Sunday, they volunteered and they knew mostly the right things to say. I'm not giving more information about the neighborhood I grew up in because I am careful to not give identifying information for my safety; it took me most of my life to get safe. I do not want the cult to threaten me more or cue me and try to set off programming or try to actively get me back as they have over the years. So I put my safety first and I hope all survivors do. I hope so much that people will hear and believe survivors more and that more survivors will get safe sooner. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok

episodes.title: When folks hear I'm a cult survivor they assume I grew up on a compound #cultsurvivor #ramcoa
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. When people first hear that I grew up being tortured by cult they often assume that meant that I grew up in a compound or very isolated - but I grew up in busy Toronto. My parents sent me to public school but there was always at least one adult in the schools, they sent me to extracurricular activities like skating where they had me and skimpy outfits and swimming but they either stayed or there was a cult adult there. They sent me to Brownies, Girl Guides, CGIT, same thing. They did limit who I came into contact with and would have just looked like overprotective parents. They also limited what I consumed of media; for years and years they only allowed me to watch children's shows like Sesame street, Mr Dressup, Polka Dot Door even when I was 12, 13. But after I disclosed child sexual abuse of a great uncle they gradually loosened that somewhat. But kids at school would be singing pop songs or talking about actors or celebrities and I didn't know what they were talking about. My parents looked good on a superficial level, they had good paying jobs, they went to church, they volunteered regularly, they knew mostly the right things to say. Unless you really trusted your gut and paid close attention to body language you wouldn't know something was off but even then you wouldn't know cult torture. The way you might know better is by looking at the signs and symptoms I showed as a cult torture survivor, such as those in my article linked in my bio and on my website. People can be cult tortured and trafficked in your community, people you know. Please believe and hear survivors. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #trafficking #traumatok

My cult abusers taught me to cut & unalive myself #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture, SH, unaliving programming, detail. The cult and my father taught me (folks inside me) to cut myself if we ever remembered or talked or tried to escape. I kept remembering and forgetting again because it was traumatic, it felt like such a betrayal, and I was still being tortured. I thought it was my own coping mechanism to suppress overwhelming memories or emotions or keep from unaliving myself, and it was, and I was also taught to do it. My father made the first real, deep cuts in my arm, holding my hand over the handle of an xacto knife as he cut and told us when to do it. Before that they started my training around 2 or 3, first on mannequin limbs, then on actual limbs, then when we were around 3 or 4 strapped to torture chairs with layers of silicone wrapped around my arm and packets of real blood beneath that they had siphoned off me or other kids. I think they taught us this because we resisted them and fought them over and over and they had to force us to hurt other kids through torture. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder #traumatok

episodes.description: TW: cult torture. I often say "the cult" when referring to the intergenerational interconnected cults my parents an extended family were part of and who tortured me, including KKK, Nazi, and satanic cults, because they are all interconnected and they share victims, resources, and torture and mind control techniques, etc. And everywhere that my parents took me, I live in Toronto Canada, they connected us up with other cults including in the UK, US, and Europe, to traffick and torture and SA me. So saying "the cult" to refer to them makes the most sense to me. But even though they are rich and interconnected they are not all powerful. They lied when they said they could know what we were thinking and feeling and doing it all times or that they would kill us if we talked. There are some good compassionate people in the world to hear and believe survivors and I am grateful for it. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumahealing

Being triggered by doctors and medical procedures #cultsurvivor #ramcoasurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Because the cult so often dressed up as doctors and nurses for torture and SA, and some of the cult members actually were doctors and nurses in their real life professions, so many folks inside of me are scared of doctors and nurses and medical procedures. So when there are really invasive or really triggering procedures I have to really prepare, bring things that help me ground in my safe bag, remind everyone inside that we are safe, and for things like surgeries or a pap smear I used to have to have someone go with me like my therapist or a friend, and I was lucky to have that. It can trigger so much trauma and it is still so hard but it is better than it used to be. And because the cult frequently used drugs on me to control me and create other effects I am scared of pharmaceuticals and I trust natural medicine more. I see a naturopath who I have such a good relationship with and deeply trust and go to her first, but I will still go to my family doctor for some issues. There are many long-term effects from the torture and trauma. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumahealing

My dissociative identity/being plural #cultsurvivor #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder #ramcoa
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. Every person who lives with dissociative identity will be different although there are overlaps and similarities. My dissociative identity is polyfragmented and co-conscious with a lot of inner cooperation and communication. But it took me years to get to there. I can now intentionally blend different folks inside me, like when I draw on my educational parts and information parts and wise parts and sometimes mother parts and me to educate about the cult torture and dissociative identity, especially because I am trying to look like one and not overtly switch. But years ago I was not able to do that. And I used to lose time and also have amnesic barriers between folks inside, some that the cult intentionally put there so that we could not collaborate together or could not remember who the abusers were and some that were there because that's how we coped with the trauma and torture. I also had many folks locked away inside by the cult and I still sometimes find folks inside that I have to rescue. #plural #ramcoa #cultsurvivor #dissociativeidentitydisorder

episodes.title: Why cult  intentionally creates robot insiders in victims (DID) #plural #ramcoa #cultsurvivor
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. People who didn't survive cult torture often don't understand why cults do what they do, such as intentionally creating robot personalities or parts inside by doing fake surgeries to convince the child that we are a robot that the cult can control our every thought, every movement, our emotions or keep us from having emotions, that the cult can track us. The cult does this to control us and to keep us silent, to keep us obedient to the cult because that allows the cult to continue their torture and trafficking and murder. And if the child does try to speak out who is going to believe us when we say that the we had surgery to make us into a robot? The cult does this because they make a huge amount of money off of us through the trafficking, not only of sexual assault but also of torture, and the child p0rn0gràphy. And they get power from it, from favors from rich people or politicians for trafficking us to them. And robots photo commands so we just submit to the torture and trafficking. So many of the cult members get off on the power they have over us, and get off on the torture and sexual assault and making us terrified. It is about power and ensuring that the cult can continue to do what they do. What the cult does is always to benefit them. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #plural #dissociativeidentitydisorder

Cult members usually do well in society and have money and power and don't seem to suffer the way that so many of us cult torture survivors do. I have physical health issues that I'm sure are direct result of the culture. And I have mental health effects that are a direct result such as the depression, anxiety, cPTSD, dissociation, did, suicidal ideation, etc. but there is hope and healing. I always continue to feel and I am not in crisis the way I was when I was still being tortured and remembering. And I am so grateful to be safe now. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #traumatok #plural

It's important to have compassion for cult-created insiders (DID) #cultsurvivor #plural
episodes.description: TW: cult torture. It's important to have compassion for cult-created insiders with the DID/being plural. For me the cult would not stop the torture until they managed to create a split who would take on the job and the name that the cult was asking. There was no way out except to create those parts. So I have a part of me who's only job is to take on the torture and submit to it, be submissive, and all she knows is torture, and I have multiple parts split off from her because the cult kept creating that job and role. I have so much compassion empathy for her. It is horrible to only know torture, but they did what we couldn't. And so I work with her and the others to help them see through my eyes here is through my ears and see that we are safe now and they don't have to keep doing that job or be caught in the trauma loop and maybe they can find things they want to do they will bring them some comfort or joy in the present. It helps to have compassion even for the folks inside that we might dislike or even be scared of, like for me the cult-created folks who put forth programming to unalive myself or hurt myself. Again they endured torture and took on the job that no one else inside could but we had to to stay alive and survive the torture. So it helps to work with them with compassion and empathy which cuts through the mind control because the mind control and torture was done with hate. #cultsurvivor #ramcoa #plural #systok #dissociativeidentitydisorder
